Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
From: Terry Barlow <twb176@...>

::RebelYell::
RebelYell sensed the agitation in Lunarpine's voice.
It didnt matter much to him.He knew that he was a
soldier, and his job wasnt to make friends.He had seen
too many friends get blown to scrap.However,he was
also a Maximal, and he had made a vow to do whatever
it takes to serve his people, so he could be more
civil when he had to be."I apologize to you both", he
said,"now how can I help?"
--- cyberwolf4@... wrote:
> Lunarpine hears the words of RebelYell and walks out
> from underneath 
> the ship. He sets down the welding equipment he'd
> been using.
> 
> "Excuse me, you must be the new bot Spears told me
> about." he looked 
> up at the taller bot, "Thats no way to make an
> entrance, thats a 
> ladybot you're speaking to, try a little respect."
> This new bot 
> wasn't going to make any friends around the Ark with
> that attitude 
> and Lunarpine was letting him know it straight up.
> 
> "My names Lunarpine." The bot extended his hand
> toward RebelYell.
> 
> (OOC the proper term is What the PIT is going on on
> this slaggin 
> rock: the Pit is the cybertronian equivilant to our
> hell.)
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow
> <twb176@y...> wrote:
> > :RebelYell:
> > 
> >  RebelYell had been flying for several hours when
> off
> > in the distance he spotted a ship."Must be it" he
> > thought.As he got closer he saw a bot sitting at
> the
> > entrance.When he landed he dropped the parts he
> had
> > been carrying on the ground."I'm RebelYell," he
> said.
> > "Now could somebody tell me what the hell is goin'
> on
> > on this slaggin' rock??"
> > --- logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > ::Shadow Wing/Spears::
> > > 
> > > Shadow Wing::
> > > She walked out of the ship and saw Spears
> sitting at
> > > the entrance 
> > > looking like she was deep in thought. "Hey, you
> OK?"
> > > 
> > > Spears::
> > > She turned with a little suprize. She relaxed
> and
> > > smiled,"Geez, you 
> > > startled me."  She chuckled, "yeah, I'm fine."
> > > 
> > > Shadow Wing::
> > > "OK, so what's on your mind? You looked like you
> > > were taking a trip 
> > > back to Cybertron." She said with half a
> chuckle.
> > > 
> > > Spears::
> > > "yeah, but not in this pile of rusted bolts.
> This
> > > ship is so damaged, 
> > > it wouldn'tfly again even if we replaced
> everything
> > > onboard down to 
> > > the paper clips in the captain's desk. The ark
> is
> > > grounded for good. 
> > > And all we can do is sit here and repair parts
> of it
> > > just enough to 
> > > survive another pred attack." She gave a deep
> sigh.
> > > 
> > > Shadow Wing::
> > > She put a comforting hand on Spears shoulder. 
> > > "Don't worry, 
> > > everything will work out.  You'll see." She
> smiled
> > > at Spears and 
> > > walked down the ramp.  She had another welding
> torch
> > > with her.  She 
> > > walked up to Lunarpine, "Hello beloved."  
> > >
